metadata.dc:description: A case of Extramedullary Plasmacytoma of nasopharynx is reported in a 41 years old man. The presenting symptom was bilateral nasal obstruction. Multiple Myeloma was excluded. The treatment was surgical excision and postsurgical radiotherapy. At present the patient is well.
metadata.dc:title: Plasmocitoma extramedular solitario de cávum.
[Solitary extramedullary plasmocytoma of the nasal cavity].
